examples: My honest opinion is they took a sledgehammer to crack a nut.
As the proverb goes, an honest man's pillow is his peace of mind.
As a writer, I try to be honest about my own past mistakes.
It's good to be honest and admit your mistakes.
Daniel knew he had to make an honest woman of Rachel when they discovered she was expecting their child, so he proposed and they had a beautiful wedding ceremony.
words.defineEn: telling the truth and having no intention of cheating or stealing
words.defineVi: nói sự thật và không có ý định gian lận hoặc ăn cắp

examples: His complaints have a familiar ring.
The music in the movie had a familiar rhythm to it.
The struggle feels familiar.
Less familiar, however, is the history of the Pride Parade.
Look familiar?
words.defineEn: describing something or someone well known to one
words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó nổi tiếng với một

examples: The lawyer presented the right argument in court.
Bring Helen a present.
Bring a present for Helen.
He presented a false document as evidence in the court case.
Our hosts presented us with an embarrassment of riches.
words.defineEn: (of people) being somewhere particular
words.defineVi: (của mọi người) ở một nơi nào đó cụ thể

examples: The judge's ruling carries significant weight in the legal community.
No conventional drugs had produced any significant change.
When the storm arrived, his house suffered significant damage.
The company's new product line contributed to a significant increase in its overall yield for the quarter.
The study yielded significant findings that could advance medical research.
words.defineEn: important or great enough to be noticed or be effective
words.defineVi: đủ quan trọng hoặc tuyệt vời để được chú ý hoặc có hiệu quả

examples: The previous administration kicked the can down the road on climate change, and now we're facing the consequences.
After careful consideration, he abandoned his previous beliefs and embraced a new ideology.
The histograms in the previous applets computed the total number of times each web page was visited at the current stage of the game.
They have made up for their previous disagreements by attending couples therapy.
The company's previous unethical practices were exposed, and as old sins cast long shadows, it led to a loss of customers and revenue.
words.defineEn: occurring or existing before what is being mentioned
words.defineVi: xảy ra hoặc tồn tại trước những gì đang được đề cập

examples: Careful planning laid the foundations for the nation’s economic miracle.
he feels at sea with economics.
Recent economic performance suggests that a major crisis is at hand.
The recent economic recovery was almost entirely led by exports.
The modest pace of economic growth has also kept the lid on price growth.
words.defineEn: relating to the trade, industry, or production of wealth or the field that is concerned with these issues
words.defineVi: liên quan đến thương mại, công nghiệp hoặc sản xuất của cải hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan đến những vấn đề này

examples: Your explanation is too complicated!
They made it too complicated.
The answer is complicated.
The answer is complicated.
The U.S. tax code is complicated.
words.defineEn: difficult to understand, deal with, or explain due to having many parts or factors
words.defineVi: khó hiểu, xử lý hoặc giải thích do có nhiều bộ phận hoặc yếu tố

examples: he exact ingredients of Coca-Cola are a trade secret.
I don't need the exact amount.
I remember the exact date when I graduated from college.
Seventy to 95 percent of us, to be exact.
Exact numbers are like the number of seconds in a minute or the number of eggs in a dozen.
words.defineEn: in complete accordance with fact and accurate or correct in every detail
words.defineVi: hoàn toàn phù hợp với thực tế và chính xác hoặc chính xác trong từng chi tiết

examples: I'm sick of your foolishness.
I'm sick of your foolishness.
You get sick to the back teeth with it.
I am sick to death of hearing your excuses.
He was sick of being the butt of their jokes.
words.defineEn: not in a good and healthy physical or mental state
words.defineVi: không ở trạng thái thể chất hoặc tinh thần tốt và khỏe mạnh

examples: That man eats Ramen noodles daily for dinner but for his dog, he threw a big party.
The plants want watering daily.
The mother of two young children felt overwhelmed by her daily tasks, which included cooking, cleaning, and child-rearing.
And you still can't get a good daily woman now to clean, not for love or money.
Support your thyroid health by incorporating bladderwrack supplements into your daily routine.
words.defineEn: done, happening, or produced every day
words.defineVi: thực hiện, xảy ra, hoặc sản xuất mỗi ngày

examples: My mouth felt completely dry.
I dried my hands with a soft towel.
His throat was dry as dust.
Try some dried apricots as a healthy snack.
The flowers died during a dry spell.
words.defineEn: lacking moisture or liquid
words.defineVi: thiếu độ ẩm hoặc chất lỏng

examples: With the promotion, the company's future is now in his hands.
The country's future is balanced on a razor's edge.
The whole future of the project is still up in the air.
A question mark hangs over the future of the company.
If sales don't improve, the company might not have a future.
words.defineEn: coming to exist or happening after this moment
words.defineVi: sắp tồn tại hoặc xảy ra sau thời điểm này

examples: Holy moly, this is exciting news!
The company CEO let the employees in on the exciting news about the upcoming merger.
Hockey is an exciting sport played on ice or field, with sticks and a small puck or ball.
Take the initiative and fill your life with exciting experiences.
They claim drag racing is the most exciting motor sport.
words.defineEn: making us feel interested, happy, and energetic
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy thích thú, hạnh phúc và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: Last night we served individual portions of chicken and mushroom aspic.
As a health-conscious individual, he sprinkled ground flaxseed over his morning yogurt.
Then the punishment of individuals invariably took account of the harm or damage done to the victim.
They ordered individual mini meatloaves, topped with a tangy ketchup glaze.
As a health-conscious individual, he appreciated the nutritional benefits of incorporating poppy seeds into his meals.
words.defineEn: considered a separate or distinct entity
words.defineVi: được coi là một thực thể riêng biệt hoặc khác biệt

examples: The caretaker had taken French leave.
The French army held the town for three days.
Her favorite perfume is a French brand.
French cuisine is known for its delicious cheeses and wines.
The head teacher usually takes us for French.
words.defineEn: relating to the country, people, culture, or language of France
words.defineVi: liên quan đến đất nước, con người, văn hóa, hoặc ngôn ngữ của Pháp

examples: The new loan takes the total debt to $100 000.
Add 9 to the total.
A total of $250 million is up for grabs this year.
The total cost of the project is $10,500, to be precise.
In one way or another, the representatives will be compared with the total client system.
words.defineEn: including or comprising the whole quantity
words.defineVi: bao gồm hoặc bao gồm toàn bộ số lượng

examples: Brown algae have complex life cycles with genetic diversity.
Love is a complex emotion that can bring immense joy and deep sorrow.
It makes light work of a complex process thanks to a series of easy-to-use wizards.
The professor delivered a lecture on abstract mathematics, exploring complex theories and formulas.
Understanding this complex legal document is Lombard Street to a China orange for most people.
words.defineEn: having or made of several parts
words.defineVi: có hoặc làm bằng một số bộ phận

examples: The carpet has worn thin in places.
She includes thin slices of celery in her diet.
Her husband disappeared into thin air for years.
They built the cell phone industry out of thin air in the mid-1980s.
She layered thin slices of prosciutto between crusty bread, fresh mozzarella, and sun-dried tomatoes for a gourmet panini.
words.defineEn: having opposite sides or surfaces that are close together
words.defineVi: có các mặt đối diện hoặc các bề mặt gần nhau

examples: Military leaders took over the government.
A military delegation was led by the Chief of Staff.
The Purple Heart, our nation's oldest military medal, is awarded to those service men and women who have borne the battle, sacrificing life and limb.
If military force were to be used, then that would be a different ball game.
The parade is the first sign of the new regime flexing its military muscles.
words.defineEn: related to the armed forces or soldiers
words.defineVi: liên quan đến lực lượng vũ trang hoặc binh lính

examples: The construction project was completed without a hitch, thanks to the hard work of our team and the diligence of our contractors.
Thanksgiving is never complete without the aroma of a succulent turkey.
Tacos aren't complete without a generous amount of grated cheese on top.
They made complete pigs of themselves at the dinner.
Please return the completed form at your earliest convenience.
words.defineEn: having all the necessary parts
words.defineVi: có tất cả các bộ phận cần thiết

examples: But the global problem is likely to be much larger than the sum of its parts.
The United Nations is considered a big gun in global diplomacy.
We are on the threshold of a new era in global relations.
Europe has found itself truly at the threshold of a global crisis.
The company's destination was to become a global leader in sustainable technology.
words.defineEn: related to the entire world
words.defineVi: liên quan đến toàn bộ thế giới

examples: His advice wasn't very helpful.
A CEO may receive helpful suggestions from the least experienced employee, as even a mouse may help a lion.
Thank you, you've been so helpful.
Morin's book is a helpful guide to surviving the first few months in harness.
His kind and helpful nature is evident in the way he treats others.
words.defineEn: providing assistance or useful help in making a situation better or easier
words.defineVi: cung cấp hỗ trợ hoặc giúp đỡ hữu ích trong việc làm cho một tình huống tốt hơn hoặc dễ dàng hơn

examples: Danish Blue cheese is fantastic in vegetarian dishes.
The vibrant hue of damson makes it a fantastic ingredient for homemade fruit popsicles.
Take time by the forelock and accept that fantastic internship!
She told me that yeast extract is a fantastic seasoning substitute for reducing sodium in my meals.
All my friends agree that Gruyère is a fantastic melting cheese.
words.defineEn: extremely amazing and great
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: The plot is almost impossible to follow.
In the end, she succeeded because nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
We can't say it's impossible until we've explored all avenues.
I find it impossible to get through to her.
Jannet has a mind like a sieve, so it's impossible for her to forget that.
words.defineEn: not able to be or happen; not possible to do
words.defineVi: không thể hoặc xảy ra; không thể làm

examples: The active ingredient checks the growth of bacteria.
Mary gets on in years gracefully, maintaining her active lifestyle and pursuing her passions.
Even in his old age, Mr. Jenkins remains fit as a flea by taking long walks every day and maintaining an active lifestyle.
The accident left Peter with a broken leg, but thanks to a successful surgery and intensive rehabilitation, he was able to get back on his feet and resume his active lifestyle.
At a ripe old age, Mary remains active and engaged in various hobbies and interests, embracing life to the fullest.
words.defineEn: (of a person) doing many things with a lot of energy
words.defineVi: (của một người) làm nhiều việc với rất nhiều năng lượng
